articles.author: Mehul Srivastava, Andrew England
articles.title: Israeli soldiers killed hostages waving a white flag after mistaking them for Hamas fighters - Financial Times
articles.description: Captives’ families plan protest march to pressure government as talks with Qatar resume in Europe
articles.content:
The Israeli army misidentified shirtless male hostages waving a white flag in Gaza and shot all three in violation of its rules of engagement, said a military official on Saturday.
